todos.title: Decision
todos.body: You have to make the toughest business decision in your life that is not easy nor black and white, how do you go about making the decision?

todos.title: Passion
todos.body: Why do you like…?

todos.title: Relationships
todos.body: Who do you like to hang out with when you are not working? Are you part of any organizations?

todos.title: Risk
todos.body: What’s the biggest risk you’ve taken?

todos.title: Experience
todos.body: What types of … systems have you worked with and what is your preferred style?

todos.title: Mentors
todos.body: What people inspire you?

todos.title: Singularities
todos.body: What important truths do very few people agree with you on?

todos.title: Books
todos.body: What are your top three books you would recommend?

todos.title: Time
todos.body: Were they on-time?

todos.title: Failure
todos.body: Tell me about your failures in life?  How have you dealt with them?

todos.title: Storytelling
todos.body: Tell me a story?

todos.title: Emotions
todos.body: On a spectrum of emotions and logic, where do you fit in?

todos.title: Organization
todos.body: Is your car, home, office clean or messy?

todos.title: Sparring
todos.body: If a colleague kept embarrassing themselves in a meeting by saying umm after every word how would you respond?

todos.title: Successful Entrepreneurship
todos.body: Have you ever started a profitable business?  What made it successful?

todos.title: Feeling
todos.body: Do you get a good feeling when you work with them?

todos.title: Skill
todos.body: Do they have the resources to meet your objectives?

todos.title: Reputation
todos.body: Do other people say good things about them?

todos.title: Habits
todos.body: Describe to me a typical day of yours?

todos.title: Spiritual
todos.body: Are you spiritual?

todos.title: Commitment
todos.body: Are they hard working, willing to put in extra non-traditional hours when needed?

todos.title: Mentors
todos.body: Who do you go to for help?

todos.title: Numbers
todos.body: When was the last time you used numbers to improve your life?

todos.title: Technology Literacy
todos.body: What types of … have you used and how did you learn them?

todos.title: Fear
todos.body: What is your biggest fear?

todos.title: Devil’s Advocate
todos.body: What do you think about…?

todos.title: I’m Stuck
todos.body: What do you do when you get stuck on a problem?

todos.title: Food
todos.body: What did you eat for breakfast?

todos.title: Stroop Test
todos.body: Say the following colors – a. Black, b. Gray, c. Gray, d. Black (if you say black instead of Gray for “c” you are good at focusing).

todos.title: Prediction
todos.body: Predict something for me.

todos.title: Business Integrity
todos.body: If you had to either lie to an investor about your Do they have business integrity?

todos.title: Philosophy
todos.body: If you could create three core values around…, what would they be?

todos.title: Response
todos.body: If someone said something to you in a meeting that pissed you off what would you do?

todos.title: Dirty Work
todos.body: If I told you part of your job was tedious data entry what would you say?

todos.title: Process
todos.body: If I came to you for strategy on how to start a new business, what would you tell me?

todos.title: English
todos.body: How well are your language skills.  What is a predicate (part the part of a sentence or clause containing a verb and stating something about the subject e.g., went home in John went home ).

todos.title: Communication
todos.body: How do you like to communicate with others?

todos.title: Impossible Question
todos.body: Here is a piece of paper.  Tell me (insert impossible question)…?

todos.title: Guide/Give
todos.body: Have you ever mentored someone.  Tell me about the experience.  When they came for help what did you do?

todos.title: Candor
todos.body: Do you like to be straight with people or softly criticize?

todos.title: Team/Family
todos.body: Do you believe that businesses should be a team or a family?

todos.title: Show Me Around
todos.body: Design something for me on InDesign, Illustrator, VisualStudio, Excel, Word, Photoshop, VideoEditor.

todos.title: Safe Environment
todos.body: Ask interviewee where they would be most comfortable meeting and how long they would want to meet.  Brain works much better when not under pressure.

todos.title: Conflict
todos.body: Are you comfortable confronting people and provide tough love?

todos.title: What is your biggest struggle in life?
